title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Utilizing Digital Resources for Nursing Practicum Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes digital content development and application methods to support practical training using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze quality management cases occurring during nursing home practicums and propose improvement measures using digital platforms
Learners can apply at least three communication skills required during practicums through mobile microlearning content
Learners can design interaction processes with practicum instructors and stakeholders using digital feedback tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
